title: A List of Lists of Books Coming Out in July (which it now is impossibly)
description: Is it possible there are as many lists of new books out in July as there are books coming out in July?
author: Jeff O'Neal
excerpt: Is it possible there are as many lists of new books out in July as there are books coming out in July?
text: Welcome to Today in Books, our daily round-up of literary headlines at the intersection of politics, culture, media, and more. I did a summer reading list round-up a little while ago and that seemed to go over pretty well, and as I opened my email/RSS/social media this morning, I thought a round-up of the lists coming out about just July books might be a good way to kick off the month. Here we go. Amazon’s Best Books of July Barnes & Noble’s Picks of the Month July 2025 Indie Next List 12 Books of the Best Books of the Month in Every Genre [Book Riot] Vulture’s 7 Books You Should Read This July Goodreads’ Most Popular July Book Releases 20 Best Books to Read this July [Kirkus] Book of the Month Club’s July Picks 20 Books Coming in July [The New York Times]
html:
Welcome to Today in Books, our daily round-up of literary headlines at the intersection of politics, culture, media, and more.

I did a summer reading list round-up a little while ago and that seemed to go over pretty well, and as I opened my email/RSS/social media this morning, I thought a round-up of the lists coming out about just July books might be a good way to kick off the month. Here we go.

Amazon’s Best Books of July

Barnes & Noble’s Picks of the Month

July 2025 Indie Next List

12 Books of the Best Books of the Month in Every Genre [Book Riot]

Vulture’s 7 Books You Should Read This July

Goodreads’ Most Popular July Book Releases

20 Best Books to Read this July [Kirkus]

Book of the Month Club’s July Picks

20 Books Coming in July [The New York Times]
